1.name: The Sound of Music
1.description: A woman leaves an Austrian convent to become a governess to the children of a Naval officer widower.

2.name: Thunderball
2.description: James Bond heads to the Bahamas to recover two nuclear warheads stolen by S.P.E.C.T.R.E. Agent Emilio Largo in an international extortion scheme.

3.name: For a Few Dollars More
3.description: Two bounty hunters with the same intentions team up to track down a Western outlaw.

4.name: King Rat
4.description: A fast-taking wheeler-dealer Corporal in a Malaysian P.O.W. camp during World War II uses bribery and larceny to take de facto control of the camp from his senior officers.

5.name: Doctor Zhivago
5.description: The life of a Russian physician and poet who, although married to another, falls in love with a political activist's wife and experiences hardship during World War I and then the October Revolution.

6.name: The Greatest Story Ever Told
6.description: An all-star, large scale epic film that chronicles the life and ministry of Jesus Christ.

7.name: Repulsion
7.description: A sex-repulsed woman who disapproves of her sister's boyfriend sinks into depression and has horrific visions of rape and violence.

8.name: The Big Job
8.description: An inept gang of bank robbers, led by George The Brain, are caught and sentenced to 15 years hard labour each. When they are released from prison they start out to collect the money they ...                See full summary »

9.name: Le Bonheur
9.description: François, a young carpenter, lives a happy, uncomplicated life with his wife Thérèse and their two small children. One day he meets Emilie, a clerk in the local post office.

10.name: Faster, Pussycat! Kill! Kill!
10.description: Three go-go dancers holding a young girl hostage come across a crippled old man living with his two sons in the desert. After learning he's hiding a sum of cash around, the women start scheming on him.

11.name: Cat Ballou
11.description: A young schoolteacher turns into an outlaw to avenge her murdered father.

12.name: Pierrot le Fou
12.description: Pierrot escapes his boring society and travels from Paris to the Mediterranean Sea with Marianne, a girl chased by hit-men from Algeria. They lead an unorthodox life, always on the run.

13.name: The Rounders
13.description: In Sedona, two aging cowpokes bust broncos, charm local ladies and bet on outcomes at the rodeo.

14.name: In Harm's Way
14.description: A Naval officer, reprimanded after Pearl Harbor, is later promoted to Rear Admiral and gets a second chance to prove himself against the Japanese.

15.name: The Flight of the Phoenix
15.description: After a plane crash in the Sahara, one of the survivors says he's an airplane designer and they can make a flyable plane from the wreckage.

16.name: Battle of the Bulge
16.description: A dramatization of Nazi Germany's final Western Front counterattack of World War II.

17.name: The Great Race
17.description: In the early 20th century, two rivals, the heroic Leslie and the despicable Professor Fate, engage in an epic automobile race from New York to Paris.

18.name: Help!
18.description: Ringo Starr finds himself the human sacrifice target of a cult, and his fellow members of The Beatles must try to protect him from it.

19.name: Alphaville
19.description: A U.S. secret agent is sent to the distant space city of Alphaville where he must find a missing person and free the city from its tyrannical ruler.

20.name: What's New Pussycat
20.description: A playboy who refuses to give up his hedonistic lifestyle to settle down and marry his true love seeks help from a demented psychoanalyst who is having romantic problems of his own.

21.name: Darling
21.description: A beautiful but amoral model sleeps her way to the top of the London fashion scene at the height of the Swinging Sixties.

22.name: Inside Daisy Clover
22.description: A tomboy turned movie star deals with the cruelty of Hollywood.

23.name: The Collector
23.description: A man kidnaps a woman and holds her hostage just for the pleasure of having her there.

24.name: How to Murder Your Wife
24.description: A dedicated bachelor drunkenly marries a young woman and immediately lives to regret it.

25.name: Chimes at Midnight
25.description: The career of Shakespeare's Sir John Falstaff as a roistering companion to young Prince Hal, circa 1400 to 1413.

26.name: The Spy Who Came In from the Cold
26.description: British agent Alec Leamas refuses to come in from the Cold War during the 1960s, choosing to face another mission, which may prove to be his final one.

27.name: The Ipcress File
27.description: In London, a counter espionage Agent deals with his own bureaucracy while investigating the kidnapping and brainwashing of British scientists.

28.name: Dear Brigitte
28.description: Professor Leaf, an absent-minded poet with a prejudice against the sciences, is forced to face the fact that his son is a math prodigy with little artistic talent of his own.

29.name: The Hallelujah Trail
29.description: On its way to Denver, a cargo of whiskey destined for the miners, is sought after by the Temperance League, the U.S. Cavalry, the local Indians and the miners themselves.

30.name: The Cincinnati Kid
30.description: An up-and-coming poker player tries to prove himself in a high-stakes match against a long-time master of the game.

31.name: Ten Little Indians
31.description: Ten people are invited to a luxury mountaintop mansion, only to find that an unseen person is killing them one by one. Could one of them be the killer?

32.name: The Sons of Katie Elder
32.description: Ranch owner Katie Elder's four sons determine to avenge the murder of their father and the swindling of their mother.

33.name: That Darn Cat!
33.description: After a kidnapped bank teller uses a neighbor's wandering cat to send an SOS, the FBI assigns a cat-allergic agent to the case.

34.name: Morituri
34.description: A war pacifist is blackmailed to pose as an SS officer and to disable the scuttling explosives on freighter carrying rubber cargo to be captured by the Allies.

35.name: Ship of Fools
35.description: A varied group of passengers boarding a ship bound for pre-WWII Germany represents a microcosm of early 1930s society.

36.name: Viva Maria!
36.description: Somewhere in Central America in 1907: Maria II is the daughter of an Irish terrorist. After her father's death, she meets Maria I, a singer in a circus. She decides to stay with the circus,...                See full summary »

37.name: Von Ryan's Express
37.description: An American POW leads a group of mainly British prisoners to escape from the Germans in WWII.

38.name: The Hill
38.description: In a North African military prison during World War II, five new prisoners struggle to survive in the face of brutal punishment and sadistic guards.

39.name: Portrait in Terror
39.description: A plan to steal a valuable work of art leads to murder.

40.name: The Early Bird
40.description: Norman is the assistant helping to run a small, old fashioned dairy which is threatened by a larger, modern organisation. Norman does his best to save the dairy (and his horse) and the ...                See full summary »

41.name: Mirage
41.description: An accountant suddenly suffers from amnesia. This appears related to the suicide of his boss. Now some violent thugs are out to get him. They work for a shadowy figure known simply as The Major.

42.name: Red Beard
42.description: In 19th century Japan, a rough tempered yet charitable town doctor trains a young intern.

43.name: Shenandoah
43.description: During the Civil War, a Virginia farmer and his family vow to remain neutral, but one of the sons is captured by Union soldiers, sending the farmer to his rescue.

44.name: Those Magnificent Men in Their Flying Machines or How I Flew from London to Paris in 25 hours 11 minutes
44.description: Hoping to push Britain to the forefront of aviation, a London publisher organizes an international air race across the English Channel, but must contend with two entrants vying for his daughter, as well as national rivalries and cheating.

45.name: Space Probe Taurus
45.description: In the year 2000, the spaceship Hope One sets off to find new galaxies for colonization. However, an encounter with an alien being and a swarm of meteorites sends the ship streaking off course into a sea of monsters on an uncharted world.

46.name: The Heroes of Telemark
46.description: Norwegian resistance tries to stop German efforts to produce an atomic bomb component during World War II.

47.name: She
47.description: An Edwardian archaeologist and two companions stumble upon a lost city in East Africa, run by a beautiful queen whose love holds the promise of immortality.

48.name: The Agony and the Ecstasy
48.description: The biographical story of Michelangelo's troubles while painting the Sistine Chapel at the urging of Pope Julius II.

49.name: Voyage to the Prehistoric Planet
49.description: In 2020, after the colonization of the moon, the spaceships Vega, Sirius and Capella are launched from Lunar Station 7. They are to explore Venus under the command of Professor Hartman, but...                See full summary »

50.name: A Patch of Blue
50.description: A blind, uneducated white girl is befriended by a black man, who becomes determined to help her escape her impoverished and abusive home life by introducing her to the outside world.
